subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: juli velazquez
full_text:
--0-1460460180-1201898908=:10862
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Anne 
   
  So why does it sound so slow and robotic?  The second clip was perfect.  You could hear everything and was very clear.  If its not the editing software is it the signal from the session?  Just curious?
   
  Juli

Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
          The first repetition of the clip *is* the raw audio. Not speeded up or slowed. As it was recorded. No amplifying, no noise reduction. That is exactly how it came across. The second rep is 25 percent slowed and the 3rd is 50 percent slowed.  

  What you're hearing is exactly what happened.
  

  Ann
  
    On Feb 1, 2008, at 3:12 PM, juli velazquez wrote:

          

  Ann,
                  I heard box in there somewhere.  What do the files sound like raw?  I think by slowing them down your losing the clear responses.  Can you post one of the raw clips?  Don't worry about slowing it down or editing it.  I think your getting some great stuff, but its distored by the editing software.
   
   Juli

EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com wrote:
      
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

File : /Ann's files/ismyguidedavidstevennot012608.mp3 
Uploaded by : lisbyfarrum <lisby@...> 
Description : More from the techs: I ask if my technician is David. The first words of the reply may be "both of them," but unclear; then "Steven." "Not." 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Ann%27s%20files/ismyguidedavidstevennot012608.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:

Regards,

lisbyfarrum <lisby@...>
